column5: Well I will be heading back up to Nipissing this weekend and I need to charge the 2 new batteries that I have I have 2 new Interstate 27 series deep Cycle for the new Minn-Kota Has anyone seen and Chargers on sales If so What kind will I need I know it has to be able to charge deep cycle
I have this one it works good  http://www.canadiantire.ca/browse/product_...fromSearch=true
Zman did you get the BPS flyer.They are on sale right now,Like I mentioned before.  chargers pg 21
Thanks I can't get the link to work

I have the motomaster automatic charger; I think it is on sale until Friday for $50 it does regular and deep cycle batteries, and has 2, 12, 75 amp charge settings.  The 75 amp is for boosting.  Have had it for 5 years, works great!  Entropy
